articles.description: The 30-year-old performer appeared to be making the most of her time at her former collaborator's performance, and she also brought her son Wave, aged one, to Madison Square Garden.
articles.content:
Cardi B shared several photos and a video that had been taken during her time at SZA's concert at Madison Square Garden, which took place on Saturday night.
The 30-year-old performer appeared to be … [+2568 chars]
